p: Recently, Chen et al. found in humans that seasonal vaccination induces a poor NA-specific B-cell response, whereas anti-NA B-cell responses after an IAV infection are similar (H1N1) or even higher (H3N2) when compared to HA-specific B-cell responses. The authors also found that anti-NA Abs were cross-reactive to NA proteins from most IAV strains and that they showed prophylactic and therapeutic potential when evaluated in vivo ( 66).
